scripts.test:prod: LOCAL_ENV=prod node tests/utils/warmUp.js && LOCAL_ENV=prod AWS_REGION=us-east-1 jest --detectOpenHandles
scripts.test:qa: LOCAL_ENV=qa node tests/utils/warmUp.js && LOCAL_ENV=qa AWS_REGION=us-east-1 jest --detectOpenHandles
scripts.test:dev: LOCAL_ENV=dev node tests/utils/warmUp.js && LOCAL_ENV=dev AWS_REGION=us-east-1 jest --detectOpenHandles
